item.title: Allegiant Air to acquire Sun Country Airlines in $1.5B deal
item.description: Allegiant Air says it will acquire Sun Country Airlines in a cash-and-stock deal valued at about $1.5 billion

item.title: Meta names former Trump adviser Dina Powell McCormick as president and vice chairman
item.description: Facebook owner Meta has named Dina Powell McCormick, a former Trump administration adviser and longtime finance executive, as president and vice chair...

item.title: The Trevor Project receives $45M from MacKenzie Scott after federal funding cuts
item.description: The nonprofit Trevor Project received a $45 million gift from billionaire MacKenzie Scott at the end of 2025

item.title: California wants to mix hydrogen with gas to cut climate pollution. Critics say that poses risks
item.description: Blending green hydrogen with natural gas is seen by some as key to achieving Californiaâ€™s clean energy goals

item.title: Mattel adds an autistic Barbie to doll line devoted to diversity and inclusion
item.description: An autistic Barbie is joining Mattel's line of fashion dolls that's intended to celebrate diversity
